tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_assessments (
	id INT,
	course_id INT,
	student_id INT,
	score FLOAT,
	grade VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE course_assessments (
    assessment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT NOT NULL,
    assessment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    assessment_type VARCHAR(50),
    assessment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE student_assessment_scores (
    score_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT NOT NULL,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    submission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE course_evaluation (
    evaluation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT NOT NULL,
    evaluator_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    evaluation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE courses (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 course_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 course_description TEXT,
 course_credit_hours INT);

CREATE TABLE students (student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 student_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 student_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
 student_major VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE assessments (assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 course_id INT,
 assessment_type VARCHAR(50),
 assessment_grade DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 student_id INT,
 assessment_id INT,
 evaluation_date DATE,
 evaluation_comments TEXT);
CREATE TABLE course (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR(255), instructor VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE student (student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_name VARCHAR(255), course_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course(course_id))
CREATE TABLE assessment (assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, assessment_name VARCHAR(255), course_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course(course_id))

CREATE TABLE evaluation (evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, assessment_id INT, student_id INT, score FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES assessment(assessment_id), FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES student(student_id))

CREATE TABLE grade_report (grade_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_id INT, course_id INT, grade VARCHAR(2), FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES student(student_id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course(course_id))
